Pleasant 100 Ferry Wharf Road, Mt. Pleasant, South Carolina 29464  {{'+1-843-981-5700' | tel}}  Email Us Rooms Specials Amenities Photos Meetings Dining Nearby Contact About Our Hotel At the foot of Ravenel Bridge, our hotel overlooks Charleston Harbor and is less than six miles from Historic Downtown Charleston. We are within two miles of Patriots Point Naval & Maritime Museum, championship golf, and Mount Pleasant Waterfront Park. Spend a day at the beach, just 15 minutes away, and rest well in a comfortable suite.
